title: Inserter
description: A machine with a swing arm that can move items in and out of a variety of different entities.

override_stack_size.title: Override Stack Size
override_stack_size.description: A custom stack size to give this inserter. Overwritten by the circuit network if `control_behavior.circuit_set_stack_size` is `true`.

pickup_position.title: Pickup Position
pickup_position.description: Custom pickup position of this inserter. Only has an effect if [`InserterPrototype.allow_custom_vectors`](https://lua-api.factorio.com/latest/prototypes/InserterPrototype.html#allow_custom_vectors) is `true`.

drop_position.title: Drop Position
drop_position.description: Custom dropoff position of this inserter. Only has an effect if [`InserterPrototype.allow_custom_vectors`](https://lua-api.factorio.com/latest/prototypes/InserterPrototype.html#allow_custom_vectors) is `true`.

circuit_read_hand_contents.title: Read Contents
circuit_read_hand_contents.description: Whether or not to broadcast the current items in the hand to a connected circuit network.

circuit_read_hand_mode.title: Read Hand Mode
circuit_read_hand_mode.description: In what manner should the contents of the hand be broadcast to a connected circuit network. Only has an effect if `circuit_read_hand_contents` is `true`.

circuit_set_stack_size.title: Circuit Set Stack Size
circuit_set_stack_size.description: Whether or not this inserter should set it's stack size via a connected circuit network. What signal it uses to determine the stack size is defined by `stack_control_input_signal`.

stack_control_input_signal.title: Stack Control Input Signal
stack_control_input_signal.description: What signal should be used when determining the dynamic stack size of this inserter. Only has an effect if `circuit_set_stack_size` is `true`.
